name: SaveTheFuture-LightsAndShadows
description:
This game was developed at RMIT during 2016.2. We, Amanda Chagas and Rafael Lobo, worked together through the weeks on the course Game Design Studio 4 where we had to present one game a week. SaveTheFuture was developed on Week10 under the theme: Lights and Shadows.

This is a single-player game where the objective is to save the plant on different levels. The player needs to use a controller to play the game. This way, the player needs to pick the water with the light ghost in the present and then watering the plant with the shadow ghost in the future.
